title: Only 1 rule, Never give up
body:
Hey guys,
After playing enough games with nothing but people who cry, blame their team and say "ff at 20" I decided to see if anyone would be interested in a mainly ranked club where the only rule is to never surrender. So many winnable games are lost because team members start to abuse each other and everything goes downhill from there.

I was thinking the club would essentially be a list of people you could invite to your ranked games who you could trust won't just cry and moan. No other rules, quality banter is encouraged. Being the best isn't everything and playing out a losing game is a good way to learn.

Thoughts?

replies.body: What would be a good name for said club?
Never gonna run around and desert you
Would be a good club for sure.
We've gone with "The Rick Astley Squad" if anyone wants to join just add me. All ranks are welcome.

Would love to join.

ID - PalmerJackal
If anyone knows what movie the quote "never give up, never surrender" is from, you sir (or missus) deserve a medal.
Sounds good. You just looking for ranked players? I'm not quite there but I get so sick of normal games where people try to /ff because we're down one turret and a couple of kills.
Even if you aren't confident enough for ranked yet we still play normals :) can't always play ranked haha
Sure :) Same motto I follow. Add me if a club gets made or you need help making one.
Never waver, Never surrender, Victory is at hand
You've got yourself a MOTD there. But what is the club name?
